titles: The hind and the panther transvers'd to the story of The country-mouse and the city-mouse
author: Prior, Matthew, 1664-1721.
Halifax, Charles Montagu, Earl of, 1661-1715.
notes: A burlesque of Dryden's poem by Matthew Prior and Charles Montagu, Earl of Halifax. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
keywords: Dryden, John, 1631-1700. --  Hind and the panther.
